001package org.biopax.paxtools.io.sbgn;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.Entity;
004
005import java.util.Set;
006
007/**
008 * Detects ubiquitous molecules using a given ID set.
009 *
010 * @author Ozgun Babur
011 */
012public class ListUbiqueDetector implements UbiqueDetector
013{
014        Set<String> uris;
015
016        /**
017         * Contructor.
018         *
019         * @param uris URIs of ubiques
020         */
021        public ListUbiqueDetector(Set<String> uris)
022        {
023                this.uris = uris;
024        }
025
026        /**
027         * Checks if the ID of the PhysicalEntity is in the set.
028         * @param e PhysicalEntity or Gene to check
029         * @return true if ubique
030         */
031        public boolean isUbique(Entity e)
032        {
033                return uris.contains(e.getUri());
034        }
035}
